name: Little Kite
description: The game about one tragic evening in an unsuccessful family, when emotions and tensions are simply too high to manage.
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows XP and up Процессор: 1 Ghz and up Оперативная память: 2 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: GeForce 9500 GT (512 MB) or Radeon HD 6450 (512 MB) DirectX: Версии 9.0 Место на диске: 1.6 GB
